name: Witch Call - Reborn
description:
Enter a world of whimsy and magic in this chill game about a witch on a mission to save Halloween. Armed with a trusty wand, you'll blast your way through waves of menacing pumpkins, their grinning faces no match for your skilful aim. So don your witch's hat, grab your wand, and get ready for some pumpkin-busting fun!

Controls

  • Arrows / AD: Move
  • Up/Space: Shoot
